CustomField.description: When checked, only records previously associated with a Messenger user’s unique ID will be displayed, popped and/or auto-linked. When un-checked records matching a user’s full name will be selected if no records are found using the unique ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, only records previously associated with a Messenger user’s unique ID will be displayed, popped and/or auto-linked. When un-checked records matching a user’s full name will be selected if no records are found using the unique ID.
CustomField.label: Search exclusively with unique ID
